PolicyMarkerVocabulary.name: OECD DAC CRS
PolicyMarkerVocabulary.description: The policy marker is an OECD DAC CRS policy marker, Reported in columns 20-23, 28-31 and 54 of CRS++ reporting format.

PolicyMarkerVocabulary.name: Reporting Organisation
PolicyMarkerVocabulary.description: The policy marker is one that is defined and tracked by the reporting organisation
